title: ISlicingData.SetBoundingBoxDirection4
description: Sets bounding box direction 4 (bottom manipulator for linear slicing, outer radius for radial slicing).

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description: For linear slicing: -500.0 < bottom manipulator < 0 For radial slicing: Inner radius < outer radius < user-interface maximum for this case (see Remarks )

returns: True if direction 4 of bounding box successfully set, false if not
remarks:
Use these methods to adjust the slicing volume to include or exclude geometry for slicing:
ISlicingData::SetBoundingBoxDirection1
ISlicingData::SetBoundingBoxDirection2
ISlicingData::SetBoundingBoxDirection3
ISlicingData::SetBoundingBoxDirection4
This method fails when:
Direction exceeds the specified limits.
The bounding box cannot be created because
ISlicingData::PlaneReferences
has not been set.
